channel.title: Skull
channel.description: when someone is fighting, and they attack first, they don't get skulled, but they really do lose all their stuff, how can I make it to show the skull?

item.title: Skull
item.dc:creator: @3_Days_Grace 3 Days Grace
item.description:
@3_Days_Grace wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:2, topic:341191”]i think this code works:

if(AttackingOn2.skulledBy != playerName) { lastSkull = System.currentTimeMillis(); isSkulled = true; skulledBy = AttackingOn2.playerName; getHead(); }[/quote]
I got this error, Player.java:1327: cannot find symbol symbol : variable headIconPk location: class Player playerProps.writeByte(headIconPk); ^ client.java:9614: cannot find symbol symbol : variable lastSkull location: class client lastSkull = System.currentTimeMillis(); ^

Read full topic

item.title: Skull
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

i think this code works:

if(AttackingOn2.skulledBy != playerName) { lastSkull = System.currentTimeMillis(); isSkulled = true; skulledBy = AttackingOn2.playerName; getHead(); }

Read full topic
